svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: The horizontal axis measures the share of population living below 1.90$ international dollars per day. Colours
represent world regions. Bubble sizes are proportional the total country population.
Share of population living below $1.90 per day
Source: World Bank, Our World in Data based on Human Mortality Database and UN Child Mortality Estimates (2012)
